item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Houlihan's Tavern on the River / Deck Forty Two

The two locales are conjoined.  More information: http://www.deckfortytwo.com/

Should be awesome weather for the event and this locale has a nice outdoor patio just adjacent and south of the bridge that links the East Bay Bikepath ... so for those of you considering walking/biking to the bar, it should be easy access.

PLEASE RSVP!!!!

Hope to see you there! Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Houlihans on the River / Deck Forty Two
